turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What can I take care of for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you help me with placing a pizza order from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I have two small pizzas? On the one, I would like a barbecue chicken pizza, and on the second pizza, I would like mushrooms, onions, and green peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 2 small pizzas, one BBQ, and the other vegetarian

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. The first one is barbecued chicken.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I have extra cheese on those?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. So that's one small bbq chicken pizza and one small vegetarian with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second one is not really a vegetarian, it I think it has a couple less ingredients, mushrooms, green peppers and onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My Mistake, the second one is just mushrooms, green peppers and onions right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your Pizza will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much for your help today.
